title: How do I make sure Google talk never talks again?
content: I accidentally turned on Google assistant, then my phone pretty much froze up, I was stuck with the b*tch screaming, it wouldn't turn down OR turn off, I was at work WITH CUSTOMERS.  I hate the new update, everything f#cks up now. I want her gone forever. How do I make her disappear for good???
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
